website_summaries.verdict: You'll appreciate these shatterproof martini glasses if breakage is a problem for you, but they don't quite live up to the looks of competitors made of glass.
pros: A unique concept in barware, thanks to the plastic-derived Titan material that is shatterproof and reusable
cons: Material has been known to scratch
If you look closely, you can tell they are made of plastic, not glass

customer_reviews.title: Not like glass at all.
customer_reviews.text: These are maybe a better alternative for a wedding or outdoor event than the cheap snap-together stemware, but these are not the quality that they are advertised to be. NOT AT ALL LIKE GLASS, just plastic. Plus, after two trips through the dishwasher, they look like junk. A waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Ripped off
customer_reviews.text: This is how mine came out of the box..... WTF.... HOW THE HELL ARE YOU SUPPOSED TO BE ABLE TO USE THIS CRAP..... VERY PISSED AND SENDING BACK and one broke putting it in the box.....
customer_reviews.author: DERRICK BENTLEY

customer_reviews.title: Thin Rims, Nice Clarity, Unbreakable, but Stems Flex
customer_reviews.text: Got these plastic glasses for outdoors, around the pool. They look almost identical to their glass doppelgangers. They are very clear, the right size and have nice thin rims. Being a copy of a glass version means the stem is also thin like the glass version. Glass is much stiffer, however. The stems on these glasses bend a bit. When full, the glass wobbles just a bit. Other than the thin flexible stem, these vessels (how can you call a plastic glass a "glass?") are great for parties where a top heavy beverage risks being tipped over and crashing into a million shards of glass around a pool.
customer_reviews.author: Dan KobloshTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: These are lovely! I am particular about texture, and was delighted to discover the rim on these glasses is smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses. Or as we call them, "plasses". They are perfect for around the pool. They really don't look cheap. They are plastic and work perfectly for night swims, and the outside bar. :)
customer_reviews.author: wlbressler

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Cocktail Glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous and appear to be very high quality. I did not give them a durability rating as I just received them and have no idea how the will fare over the coming months, but my initial impression is excellent. Very clear, nice shape, thin lip, you would think they are glass. You can see a small seam on each side from the mold, but it doesn't detract from how nice these look. I'll be using them in a portable bar I made for our RV, so they will be well tested in the coming months.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Billings

customer_reviews.title: These are plastic!
customer_reviews.text: HaHa, I didn't know Tritan was plastic! I guess I should have done more research. But I just bought these on a whim! lol! I guess they will work fine, and I won't break them! They are light weight. I have only used them once so far, but I am sure they will be perfect. I was just surprised about the plastic part - but that's my own stupidity!
customer_reviews.author: KetoYogaMom

customer_reviews.title: Looks like plastic and feels like plastic
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Looks like plastic and feels like plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol V.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for taking out or for Bill
customer_reviews.text: My sloppy friend Bill will never break another martini glass again! Edit a week later-- Wash with a soft cloth or your fingers-- the Scotch Brite scrubber will leave nasty scratches on these glasses !
customer_reviews.author: V. R. Padgett

customer_reviews.title: Better off going to the dollar store
customer_reviews.text: Tritan, another word for cheap plastic so they can charge more. May be worth $1, certainly not the $5 they charge for this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: sunten

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: They're not as shiny as I thought. There is a noticeable line in each glass that looks a crack but not. Very cheap looking
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Martini Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Martini Glasses, not breakable, light and good weight. I love these for when I need a good martini.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Niederee

customer_reviews.title: They do look like glass, but there’s a seam clearly visible.
customer_reviews.text: The glasses do look good, the stems vibrate a bit and they have a seam in them, but otherwise they function well. They definitely won’t break poolside.
customer_reviews.author: Horst LaRocca

customer_reviews.title: They look much more exp
customer_reviews.text: These look great for not being glass. My husband loves his martinis, but he likes a nice glass. These are perfect for outside instead of good crystal.
customer_reviews.author: quietcows

customer_reviews.title: Good looking & durable
customer_reviews.text: Look great & are sturdy. Take these when we go to our vacation cabin
customer_reviews.author: Love the oldies

customer_reviews.title: A little light weight but serve our needs well.
customer_reviews.text: We like to have our cosmos on the screened patio. Glasses wash nicely in dishwasher and meet our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to use on patio (so no broken glass if ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Perfect to use on patio (so no broken glass if mishap) I use these all the time for my cosmos
customer_reviews.author: want2bfishin

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: They look like glass but great for around the pool. Will buy more n will buy for friends
customer_reviews.author: EILEEN CURTO

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it four stars for durability because I've only use them once
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L

customer_reviews.title: Could not be happier
customer_reviews.text: These martini glasses are great looking and perfect for outdoor use. They washed nicely in the dishwasher. A winner.
customer_reviews.author: Jane E. Scribner

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.text: Even though they are lightweight they are unbreakable (so far). I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon R Sallee

customer_reviews.title: Look like real glass and great value!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are great! We have a pool and don't want to risk having glass break in our pool. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Coco5

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice cups but for the price I thought they would be better quality.
customer_reviews.author: jonboy

customer_reviews.title: They don't appear as close to glass as I thought ...
customer_reviews.text: They don't appear as close to glass as I thought they would be - they are clearly plastic. However, that doesn't affect the taste of the martinie and my guests did not comment or object.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Worry-free poolside cocktails!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for martinis by the pool without worrying about glass. Realistic looking and totally durable.
customer_reviews.author: pierrot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great, look like real glass. Solid! Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not glass
customer_reviews.text: These are not glass.....these are plastic. What a surprise when these arrived.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Best Martini glass ever!
customer_reviews.text: The best!! You can’t tell they’re plastic! The look great! Size is nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Beier

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Patio
customer_reviews.text: The glasses look like real glass and are a good size for a martini!
customer_reviews.author: Walter J.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GLASSES
customer_reviews.text: LIKE THE STYLE AND DURABILLTY OF THEM. BROUGHT TWO SETS.
customer_reviews.author: EUNICE COLLINS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved them. They look great and are dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Foley

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Thin Plastic
customer_reviews.text: Can’t believe I fell for this. Cost should be $4. These are too expensive at $1 per.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bodewell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These glasses look like real glass and can be used by the pools where glass is usually prohibited.
customer_reviews.author: Karen H.

customer_reviews.title: Fine for daily use and crowd serving with caveats.
customer_reviews.text: For daily cocktail mixes calling for martini style glasses, these work fine. I had success in freezing/chilling these glasses for mixes that require a chill, but these are plastic, after all and the chill is ephemeral at best. But you will love the clean-up! However, stems do break with plastic too, so be careful. Also, you will need to take care in cleaning not to use harsh sponges or brushes as this will scratch the plastic surfaces as does using kleenex tissues (It's like fine sand paper) on plastic lensed eyewear.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Haynes

customer_reviews.title: ... know why all the other reviews say they look great. They're total plastic and they look it
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why all the other reviews say they look great. They're total plastic and they look it. Could have bought them at the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Nice Style, Doesn’t Wear Well
customer_reviews.text: These look great new but despite only hand washing, they get cloudy from even the softest dish cloths. Great casual stemwear for near a swimming pool.
customer_reviews.author: Alain Moreau

customer_reviews.title: What are these again????
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake by thinking these were “glass”. They are not glass in any way shape or form. The edges to drink from taste plastic like a throw away champagne glass. Next time I will look for 100% glass instead then keep these for traveling lol
customer_reviews.author: sassypants2008

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our evening cocktail cruises on our pontoon boat. Nice quality and they look just like glass. It's only when you pick them up and notice how light they are can you tell they're plastic
customer_reviews.author: Charles H. Griswold

customer_reviews.title: Not so great very cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: I should have stuck with real glass, this products looks very cheap and plastic-ish they didn't look like glass at all. And have a very visible seam down the middle, the dollar store had better looking glass truly disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.author: MACEO MARSHALL

customer_reviews.title: Great for a pool party
customer_reviews.text: We have a pool and I am always a wreck about glass by the pool. These look great, are a clear plastic, and have taken several knocks to the floor with no worse for the wear. I have dishwashed them and hand washed with no issues at all. The price is fantastic. Four glasses. No breaking, no worries by the pool. I love these!
customer_reviews.author: Mama

customer_reviews.title: Skip it
customer_reviews.text: These are dollar store quality at a much higher price. We’ve only hand washed them and they are spotted like crazy. Super disappointing given the price tag. Great that they BPA free, that’s about the only positive.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I’ve washed them on the top rack of my dishwasher and they came out looking good as new. Used them last night and they were a perfect size and weight for using outdoors on the deck. None were broken!!
customer_reviews.author: Lkretz

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: We only use plastic around our pool We received our order and in perfect condition and professorially packed. Ran through the dishwasher and they still look brand new. We love them.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Dickey

customer_reviews.title: So not worth 23 bucks
customer_reviews.text: These are very thin plastic cups that should be a dozen for a dollar. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: yetanotherreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Definitely durable and lightweight. Doesn't feel like glass but it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Hisen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for casual/outdoor drinks
customer_reviews.text: Love these lightweight martini glasses. Durable and perfect for outdoor/pool drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Let’s Party
customer_reviews.text: Great for casual party. You don’t have to worry about someone breaking your expensive martini glasses. They are plastic and won’t impress anyone but do the job in a casual atmosphere.
customer_reviews.author: ForrestH

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. The stem is a bit springy if you slam them down, but you shouldn't do that with Martini glasses and glass ones would break if you did that with them. But they look great.
customer_reviews.author: David Cummings

customer_reviews.title: seem to be very nice
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and easy to awash. Work great for the patio and eliminate the worry about broken glass.
customer_reviews.author: MicJay

customer_reviews.title: A Cute Gift
customer_reviews.text: These glasses were part of a gift pkg with a martini book. Recipient seemed to like them.
customer_reviews.author: D Cullen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality glasses
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift. They are very good quality and are perfect for use out on the patio.
customer_reviews.author: kathy hershelman

customer_reviews.title: No glass on the boat!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for my application not wanting glass on a boat. Doesnt feel like cheap plastic. Great for the money.
customer_reviews.author: boater

customer_reviews.title: Great for drinking on the deck!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used them yet but they are very nice, look like glass and look like they should be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: L. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shape, pretty enough and when they collide with my stone floors, they bounce instead of shattering.
customer_reviews.author: Cotton

customer_reviews.title: good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and nice looking, not cheap or thin. Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: Ms Blatvasky

customer_reviews.title: Martini Glasses look good
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. Glasses look great and necessary for outdoor living.
customer_reviews.author: MarCon

customer_reviews.title: but they are good and you don't have to worry about braking them
customer_reviews.text: You will instantly know it is plastic, but they are good and you don't have to worry about braking them.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect lightweight sizable martini glasses. No worries of breaking a glass with these lovelies!
customer_reviews.author: nonnawick

customer_reviews.title: Good looking for show props.
customer_reviews.text: There was no packing material in the least so though unbreakable, they do scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet McCreary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Clear, looks like glass. Good value, great to use outside
customer_reviews.author: Portia Edens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for a party where you don't have to worry about glass breaking.
customer_reviews.author: MaryanneP

product_meta.title: Unbreakable Martini Glasses - 100% Tritan - Shatterproof, Reusable, Dishwasher Safe (Set of 4)
feature_bullets: Shatterproof, reusable, and dishwasher safe beer glasses - BPA Free
Each Martini glass is made from 100% Tritan, a durable plastic like material
Looks like real glassware. Elegant, but won't shatter or break like glass
Extremely durable, dishwasher safe and will not cloud like plastic

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars212 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
